title: Crime Alert 11.08.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.08.21
description:
A drunk driver kills a mother and injures several others. A woman pulls a gun on 7-year-old trick-or-treater.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
